name: Fragment's Note: After Stories LITE (ENG)
description:
* To play the complete game, please purchase the FULL version.


The long-awaited sequel arrives! Fragment's Note - After Stories is the newest installment in the deeply-moving, romance visual novel series Fragment's Note. After Stories takes off immediately after the events of Fragment's Note, following the three heroines and the stories of their brand new beginnings.

* All text and menus in this game are in ENGLISH

** Compatible with iOS 6.0 and above


- Summary -
Fragment's Note - After Stories is the direct sequel to the deeply-moving, slice-of-life/romance visual novel Fragment's Note. After Stories takes off immediately after the end of the events in Fragment's Note and follows each of the three heroines and their new beginnings with the protagonist, Yukiha Tenjo.
Game progression is linear, choices and alternate routes are NOT available.

* This is a direct sequel to Fragment's Note and completion of the original game highly recommended.


- News -
The wildly popular original Fragment's Note also available!
Please follow our Twitter account for the latest Fragment's Note news!

* All tweets are in Japanese.
